      • retrieveUserID

        short retrieveUserID(java.lang.String emailName,
                     java.lang.String dominoName,
                     java.lang.String jwtClaim)

        Retrieve the user id using a SAML dance. Info about the user is cached locally

        Parameters:
        emailName - User’s public email (e.g. jerrygarcia@prod.hclpnp.com)
        dominoName - User’s mapped Domino name (abbreviated or full DN) (e.g. Jerry Garcia/ProjectKeep)
        jwtClaim - current JWT Claim, used to compute cache expiration
        Returns:
        status code. Zero is “no error”

      • setPrivKey
